Uses of Package
org.apache.hama.ipc

  • Packages that use org.apache.hama.ipc 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp
    BSP computing framework.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message
    Contains the implementation of message transfer.
    org.apache.hama.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.
    org.apache.hama.util
    Common utilities.
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.ipc used by org.apache.hama.bsp 
    Class and Description
    BSPPeerProtocol
    Protocol that task child process uses to contact its parent process.
    GroomProtocol
    A protocol for BSPMaster talks to GroomServer.
    HamaRPCProtocolVersion
    There is one version id for all the RPC interfaces.
    JobSubmissionProtocol
    Protocol that a groom server and the central BSP Master use to communicate.
    MasterProtocol
    A new protocol for GroomServers communicate with BSPMaster.
    VersionedProtocol
    Superclass of all protocols that use Hadoop RPC.
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.ipc used by org.apache.hama.bsp.message 
    Class and Description
    HamaRPCProtocolVersion
    There is one version id for all the RPC interfaces.
    VersionedProtocol
    Superclass of all protocols that use Hadoop RPC.
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.ipc used by org.apache.hama.ipc 
    Class and Description
    AsyncRPC.NioServer
    An RPC Server.
    AsyncServer
    An abstract IPC service using netty.
    HamaRPCProtocolVersion
    There is one version id for all the RPC interfaces.
    RemoteException 
    RetryPolicies.MultipleLinearRandomRetry
    Given pairs of number of retries and sleep time (n0, t0), (n1, t1), ..., the first n0 retries sleep t0 milliseconds on average, the following n1 retries sleep t1 milliseconds on average, and so on.
    RetryPolicies.MultipleLinearRandomRetry.Pair
    Pairs of numRetries and sleepSeconds
    RetryPolicy
    Specifies a policy for retrying method failures.
    RPC.Server
    An RPC Server.
    Server
    An abstract IPC service.
    VersionedProtocol
    Superclass of all protocols that use Hadoop RPC.
  • Classes in org.apache.hama.ipc used by org.apache.hama.util 
    Class and Description
    Server
    An abstract IPC service.
